Interface PathElement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface PathElement
    A PathElement.
    Author:
    void

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fill(Mat4 transform, BatchManager batchManager)
      Render this path element as a fill to the batchManager using data from the Context and the parameters given.
      Vec2 stroke(LineParameters lineParameters, Mat4 transform, BatchManager batchManager, Vec2 currentPos)
      Render this path element as a stroke to the batchManager using data from the Context and the parameters given.

    • Method Detail

      • stroke

        Vec2 stroke(LineParameters lineParameters,
          Mat4 transform,
          BatchManager batchManager,
          Vec2 currentPos)
        Render this path element as a stroke to the batchManager using data from the Context and the parameters given.
        Parameters:
        lineParameters - the LineParameters to use when stroking the path
        batchManager - the BatchManager
        currentPos - the current position on the path
        Returns:
        the new current position
